subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Steve Yzerman, the Detroit Red Wings’ vice president, will assemble the Canadian men’s team for the 2010 Vancouver Olympics after being named Canada’s executive director, replacing Wayne Gretzky.
snippet: Steve Yzerman, the Detroit Red Wings’ vice president, will assemble the Canadian men’s team for the 2010 Vancouver Olympics after being named Canada’s executive director, replacing Wayne Gretzky.
